welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burnham on Crouch! Known for its charming coastal beauty and sailing culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy our lovely town during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport primarily serves low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
